item.title: The IntuneCLI for automated Intune management
item.description: Managing Intune can be challenging, especially when having multiple Microsoft Intune environments. Because of that, I started project IntuneAssistant. A part of the project is a CLI tool that can run as a daemon in your own environment. In this small blog, I explain how to use the CLI and what are my thoughts for the future.
